name: CustomerTaxExemption
comment: Maintains the details of customers or subscribers who received tax exemptions.
vf short description: Maintains the details of customers or subscribers who received tax exemptions.

fields.name: CustomerTaxExemptionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: CustomerTaxExemptionKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the customer tax exemption in ALDM. Each Customer Tax Exemption Key value represents a unique customer tax exemption. //CES:Generated Key according BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.CUST_EXMPT_SEQ//OptimaGenerated key based on Customer Tax Exemption Id and Customer Tax Exemption Serv Id

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date from which the customer tax exemption is effective. //CES:BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.EFFECTIVE_DATE//Optima:CMF_EXEMPT. DATE_ACTIVE

fields.name: CustomerTaxExemptionId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the customer tax exemption in the source system. //CES:BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.CUST_EXMPT_SEQ//OptimaCMF_EXEMPT.TRACKING_ID

fields.name: TaxAuthority
fields.comment: Indicates the authority providing tax exemption. Exemption can be provided by different authorities. However, if all the authorities provide tax exemption for this customer, then this is as *. //CES:BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.TAX_AUTHORITY//Optima://Customized per implementation

fields.name: TaxExpirationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which tax-exemption expires. //CES:BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.TAX_EXPIRATION_DATE//Optima:CMF_EXEMPT.DATE_EXPIRATION

fields.name: TaxReferenceNo
fields.comment: Number of the customer tax exemption certificate. //CES:BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.TAX_REFERENCE_NO//Optima:CMF_EXEMPT. CERTIFICATE

fields.name: TaxJurisdiction
fields.comment: Indicates the actual name or code of the tax jurisdiction. //CES:BL1_CUST_TAX_EXMPT.TAX_JURISDICTION//Optima:Case CMF_EXEMPT.exempt_federal = 1 then country_codeelse CMF_EXEMPT.exepmt_state = 1 then State_codeelse Case CMF_EXEMPT.exempt_county = 1 then County_codeelse Case CMF_EXEMPT.exempt_city = 1 then city_codeelse Franchise_code//Please validate during implementation

fields.name: TaxTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerTaxExemptionServId
fields.comment: Indicates the Original server ID to uniquely identify tracking_id. //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT. TRACKING_ID_SERV

fields.name: TenantId
fields.comment: Unique internal identifier for tenant. //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT. TENANT_ID

fields.name: TaxStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: TaxConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: TaxStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: TaxConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: ExemptFederalFlag
fields.comment: Exempt from federal taxes? (1 = yes) //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT.EXEMPT_FEDERAL

fields.name: ExemptStateFlag
fields.comment: Exempt from state taxes? (1 = yes) //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT.EXEMPT_FEDERAL

fields.name: ExemptCountryFlag
fields.comment: Exempt from county taxes? (1 = yes) //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT.EXEMPT_FEDERAL

fields.name: ExemptCityFlag
fields.comment: Exempt from city taxes? (1 = yes) //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT.EXEMPT_CITY

fields.name: ExemptOtherFlag
fields.comment: Exempt from other taxes? (1 = yes) //Optima:CMF_EXEMPT.EXEMPT_OTHER

fields.name: CountrySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: StateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
